attr.title: BomberPibe
attr.desc: A 2D platformer with a unique double jump mechanic using your own exploding head.
attr.inst: Download the Linux version of the game free from itch.io (https://clubdeprogramacion.itch.io/bomberpibe), extract, and copy BomberPibe.x86_64 to the port's folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the **Linux version** of the game free from [itch.io](https://clubdeprogramacion.itch.io/bomberpibe), extract, and copy `BomberPibe.x86_64` to the port's folder.
